titleInfo.title: Smolnik et al v. Van Dyke et al
titleInfo.subTitle: AMENDED FINAL PROGRESSION ORDER granting 78 Motion to Extend Deposition Deadline and Summary Judgment Motion. Deposition deadline is September 15, 2005 and all Motions for Summary Judgment shall be filed on or before October 17, 2005. Signed by Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken on 8/11/2005. (PCV, )

titleInfo.title: Smolnik et al v. Van Dyke et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER that the plaintiffs' request for oral argument 58 is denied. The plaintiffs' Motion to Compel and Request for Oral Argument 58 is granted in part and denied in part as set forth in this order. The parties shall confer regarding the specific redactions necessary for production on or before September 23, 2005. Thereafter, the defendants shall supplement, as ordered in this document, on or before October 3, 2005. The documents produced pursuant to this order shall be deemed confidential. Signed by Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken on 9/7/2005. (JAE, )

titleInfo.title: Smolnik et al v. Van Dyke et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER - A telephone conference with the undersigned magistrate judge will be held on October 3, 2005, at 11:00 a.m. Central Standard Time for the purpose of reviewing the pending motions 90, 91 and 95. Counsel for the plaintiffs shall initiate the telephone conference. Signed by Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken on 9/26/2005. (KBJ)

titleInfo.title: Smolnik et al v. Van Dyke et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER regarding 90 and denying as to the Motion in Limine andgranting as to the enlargement of progression order deadlines as set forth below; granting 91 Motion to Take Videotaped Deposition of Plaintiff, Ronald Smolnik; granting 95 Motion to Extend. The Amended Final Progression Order (Filing No. 81) is amended as set forthbelow. All depositions, whether or not they are intended to beused at trial, shall be completed by February 1, 2006. The Final Pretrial Conference with the undersigned magistrate judge is setfor August 4, 2006, at 9:00 a.m. in chambers, Suite 2271. Trial is set to commence at 8:30 a.m. on August 21, 2006, in Omaha,Nebraska, before the Honorable Joseph F. Bataillon and a jury. Signed by Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken on 10/3/2005. (ADB)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 8:04-cv-00401; Smolnik et al v. Van Dyke et al;
extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER regarding 90 and denying as to the Motion in Limine andgranting as to the enlargement of progression order deadlines as set forth below; granting 91 Motion to Take Videotaped Deposition of Plaintiff, Ronald Smolnik; granting 95 Motion to Extend. The Amended Final Progression Order (Filing No. 81) is amended as set forthbelow. All depositions, whether or not they are intended to beused at trial, shall be completed by February 1, 2006. The Final Pretrial Conference with the undersigned magistrate judge is setfor August 4, 2006, at 9:00 a.m. in chambers, Suite 2271. Trial is set to commence at 8:30 a.m. on August 21, 2006, in Omaha,Nebraska, before the Honorable Joseph F. Bataillon and a jury. Signed by Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken on 10/3/2005. (ADB)
